footer.mission: Empowering the next generation of innovators through STEM education.

hero.subtitle: Empowering Student Innovators
hero.title: Stemsphere Foundation
hero.description: We provide youth with the skills, mentorship, and a platform to excel at the intersection of science, technology, engineering, and mathematics.

benefits.title: Why Join Stemsphere?
benefits.subtitle: Discover the exclusive advantages and opportunities we provide.

cards.title: Access to Industry Mentors
cards.description: Connect with professionals from top tech companies and research institutions for guidance and inspiration.

cards.title: Collaborative Projects
cards.description: Work in teams on real-world challenges, building your portfolio and collaborative skills.

cards.title: Exclusive Workshops & Competitions
cards.description: Gain priority access to our hands-on workshops in AI, coding, robotics, and more.

cards.title: Leadership Opportunities
cards.description: Lead local initiatives, organize events, and make a tangible impact in your community.

impact.title: Our Impact
impact.subtitle: Fueling curiosity and creating future leaders in STEM.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: A world where every young person is empowered to unleash their creativity in STEM, innovate with purpose, and shape a better, more equitable future for all.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To provide accessible, hands-on STEM education and mentorship for young people, equipping them to become the next generation of problem-solvers, leaders, and innovators.

cards.title: Accessibility
cards.description: We break down barriers to ensure that quality STEM education is available to every student, regardless of their background or location.

cards.title: Collaboration
cards.description: We believe in the power of teamwork and community, fostering an environment where students learn, build, and innovate together.

cards.title: Innovation
cards.description: We encourage curiosity and creative problem-solving, empowering students to not just learn STEM, but to advance it.

cards.title: Impact
cards.description: We are driven by the goal of creating tangible, positive change‚Äîfor our students, their communities, and the world.

team.subtitle: Executive Team
team.title: Meet Our Team
team.description: Meet the outstanding students who lead Stemsphere Foundation, organizing workshops, developing programs, and driving our mission forward.

leaders.name: Diwen Huang
leaders.title: President
leaders.bio: Aspiring AI researcher and software engineer, passionate about making STEM education accessible to all.

leaders.name: Wilson Huang
leaders.title: Vice President
leaders.bio: Dedicated to creating innovative curricula that bridge the gap between classroom theory and real-world application.

leaders.bio: Exploring the intersection of technology and human-centered design to create impactful community programs.

leaders.bio: Exploring the intersection of technology and human-centered design to create impactful community programs.

leaders.bio: Ambitious STEM and business student, driven to innovate educational resources and enhance foundational learning.

leaders.name: Eden Liang

leaders.bio: Passionate about engineering, computer science and finances, dedicated to promoting hands-on and intuitive learning.

leaders.bio: Exploring the intersection of technology and human-centered design to create impactful community programs.

leaders.title: Director of Finances

getInvolved.title: Choose Your Path
getInvolved.subtitle: Whether you're a student eager to lead or a teacher ready to inspire, we have the perfect opportunity for you to make a real impact.

chapter.title: Start a Chapter
chapter.description: Bring Stemsphere to your area by leading a local chapter. You'll gain leadership skills, build a community, and get exclusive access to our network and resources.
features: Lead and mentor students in your community
Receive a comprehensive startup kit and ongoing support
Develop valuable project management and leadership skills

workshop.title: Request a Workshop
workshop.description: Bring our hands-on STEM workshops directly to your classroom or school. Our team provides engaging, curriculum-aligned content for students of all levels.
features: Choose from topics like AI, Robotics, and Web Development
Workshops are led by our experienced instructors
All materials and lesson plans are provided
Spark curiosity and inspire the next generation of innovators

donate.title: Support Our Mission
donate.description: Your contribution directly funds our workshops, provides resources to underserved students, and helps us expand our reach. Every dollar makes a difference in fostering the next generation of STEM leaders.

etransfer.title: Donate via Interac e-Transfer¬Æ
etransfer.instruction: The simplest way to donate. Send your contribution to:
etransfer.note: (Auto-deposit is enabled, no security question needed)

cards.title: Programs & Outreach
cards.description: Fuel our hands-on workshops, community hackathons, and mentorship programs, ensuring every student can participate regardless of financial barriers.

cards.title: Tools & Resources
cards.description: Equip students with essential tools for success‚Äîfrom robotics kits and lab supplies to the software licenses and digital platforms that power our collaboration.

cards.title: Growth & Accessibility
cards.description: Help us break down barriers by funding scholarships for underrepresented students and making our educational content accessible to a wider, more diverse audience.

cards.title: Organizational Sustainability
cards.description: Provide the stable foundation we need to operate, from covering essential administrative costs to supporting our dedicated volunteers and planning our future expansion.

agreement.title: 1. Agreement to Terms
agreement.p1: By accessing or using the Stemsphere Foundation website (the "Site"), you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you do not agree to all the terms and conditions, you are not authorized to use the Site.

useOfSite.title: 2. Use of the Site
useOfSite.p1: You agree to use the Site only for lawful purposes. You are prohibited from any use of the Site that would constitute a violation of any applicable law or regulation.

intellectualProperty.title: 3. Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.p1: All content on this Site, including text, graphics, logos, and images, is the property of Stemsphere Foundation or its content suppliers and is protected by Canadian and international copyright laws.

donations.title: 4. Donations
donations.p1: All donations made to Stemsphere Foundation are processed through secure third-party payment processors. Donations are non-refundable.

links.title: 5. Links to Other Websites
links.p1: Our Site may contain links to third-party websites. We have no control over and assume no responsibility for the content, privacy policies, or practices of any third-party websites.

liability.title: 6. Limitation of Liability
liability.p1: In no event shall Stemsphere Foundation be liable for any indirect, incidental, or consequential damages arising out of your use of the Site.

law.title: 7. Governing Law
law.p1: These Terms shall be governed by the laws of the province of British Columbia, Canada, without regard to its conflict of law provisions.

contact.title: 8. Contact Us
contact.p1: If you have any questions about these Terms, please contact us at:

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: Stemsphere Foundation ("we," "us," or "our") is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you visit our website.

collect.title: Information We Collect
collect.p1: We may collect personal information that you voluntarily provide to us when you fill out a contact form, sign up for a newsletter, make a donation, or otherwise contact us. This information may include your name, email address, and any other information you choose to provide.
collect.p2: Donations made through our website are processed by a third-party payment processor. We do not store or collect your payment card details.

use.title: How We Use Your Information
use.p1: We use the information we collect to:
list: Respond to your inquiries and fulfill your requests.
Send you newsletters, updates, and promotional materials that you have opted into.
Comply with applicable Canadian laws and regulations, including the Personal Information Protection and Electronic Documents Act (PIPEDA).

sharing.title: Data Sharing and Disclosure
sharing.p1: We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personally identifiable information to outside parties. This does not include trusted third parties who assist us in operating our website or servicing you, so long as those parties agree to keep this information confidential.

security.title: Data Security
security.p1: We implement a variety of security measures to maintain the safety of your personal information. However, no method of transmission over the Internet or method of electronic storage is 100% secure.

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.p1: You have the right to access, update, or request deletion of your personal information. If you wish to exercise any of these rights, please contact us.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.p1: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at:
